DellVideo.description: DellVideo provides Video specific data which includes supported GPU properties if supported.
DellVideo.longDescription: DellVideo provides Video specific data which includes supported GPU properties if supported.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

BoardPartNumber.description: This property represent Board Part Number of GPU device.
BoardPartNumber.longDescription: This property represent Board Part Number of GPU device.

BuildDate.description: This property represents BuildDate of the GPU device in yyyymmdd format.
BuildDate.longDescription: This property represents BuildDate of the GPU device in yyyymmdd format.

BusNumber.description: The bus number where this video device resides.
BusNumber.longDescription: The bus number where this video device resides.

DataBusWidth.description: Data-bus width of the PCI device.
DataBusWidth.longDescription: Data-bus width of the PCI device.

DeviceNumber.description: The device number assigned to this video for this bus.
DeviceNumber.longDescription: The device number assigned to this video for this bus.

FQDD.description: A string that contains the Fully Qualified Device Description (FQDD) - a user-friendly name for the object.
FQDD.longDescription: A string that contains the Fully Qualified Device Description (FQDD) - a user-friendly name for the object.

FirmwareVersion.description: This property represents the software version of GPU Device.
FirmwareVersion.longDescription: This property represents the software version of GPU Device.

FunctionNumber.description: The function number for this video device.
FunctionNumber.longDescription: The function number for this video device.

GPUGUID.description: This property represents the GPU GUID of the device.
GPUGUID.longDescription: This property represents the GPU GUID of the device.

GPUHealth.description: This property represents the GPU Health status.
GPUHealth.longDescription: This property represents the GPU Health status.

GPUPartNumber.description: This property represents Part Number of GPU device.
GPUPartNumber.longDescription: This property represents Part Number of GPU device.

GPUState.description: This property represents the GPU state.
GPUState.longDescription: This property represents the GPU state.

InstanceID.description: A unique identifier for the instance.
InstanceID.longDescription: A unique identifier for the instance.

LastSystemInventoryTime.description: This property provides the last time System Inventory Collection On Reboot (CSIOR) was performed or the object was last updated on iDRAC. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.
LastSystemInventoryTime.longDescription: This property provides the last time System Inventory Collection On Reboot (CSIOR) was performed or the object was last updated on iDRAC. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.

LastUpdateTime.description: This property provides the last time the data was updated. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.
LastUpdateTime.longDescription: This property provides the last time the data was updated. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.

Manufacturer.description: The name of the organization responsible for producing the PhysicalElement. This organization might be the entity from whom the Element is purchased, but this is not necessarily true.
Manufacturer.longDescription: The name of the organization responsible for producing the PhysicalElement. This organization might be the entity from whom the Element is purchased, but this is not necessarily true.

MarketingName.description: Indicates Marketing name of the GPU device.
MarketingName.longDescription: Indicates Marketing name of the GPU device.

OEMInfo.description: Indicates OEM information of the GPU device.
OEMInfo.longDescription: Indicates OEM information of the GPU device.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PCIDeviceID.description: This property contains a value assigned by the device manufacturer used to identify the type of device.
PCIDeviceID.longDescription: This property contains a value assigned by the device manufacturer used to identify the type of device.

PCISubDeviceID.description: Register that contains a value assigned by the device manufacturer used to identify the type of device.
PCISubDeviceID.longDescription: Register that contains a value assigned by the device manufacturer used to identify the type of device.

PCIVendorID.description: Register that contains a value assigned by the Video SIG used to identify the manufacturer of the device.
PCIVendorID.longDescription: Register that contains a value assigned by the Video SIG used to identify the manufacturer of the device.

SerialNumber.description: This property represent Serial Number of GPU device.
SerialNumber.longDescription: This property represent Serial Number of GPU device.

SlotLength.description: Slot length of the PCI device.
SlotLength.longDescription: Slot length of the PCI device.

SlotType.description: Slot type of the PCI device.
SlotType.longDescription: Slot type of the PCI device.

title: #DellVideo.v1_2_0.DellVideo
